snippet: Lawmakers passed a compromise $115.4 billion budget to meet Gov. Jerry Brown’s demands for restrained spending, even as the package sends billions more to public schools and increases spending on health care and social services.
abstract: California legislature passes compromise $115.4 billion budget, meeting demands by Gov Jerry Brown for spending restraint while still funding some of Democratic leaders' priority programs.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers passed a compromise $115.4 billion budget to meet Gov. Jerry Brown’s demands for restrained spending, even as the package sends billions more to public schools and increases spending on health care and social services.
